text: Keith Palmer (born 21 March 1967), better known by his stage name Maxim (formerly Maxim Reality), is a British musician. He is known for being a vocalist of the electronic music band the Prodigy. His first solo album, Hell's Kitchen, was released in 2000. Maxim was born in Peterborough. His parents are Jamaican. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Black British musicians Category:British electronic musicians Category:English singers Category:People from Cambridgeshire Category:English musicians
title: Maxim (musician)
